div.style: display: flex; padding: 20px; height: 10px; width: 570px; margin-bottom: 10px; background: #151515; border-radius: 10px; justify-content: center; align-items: center;
display: flex; padding: 20px; height: 54px; width: 570px; margin-bottom: 10px; background: #151515; border-radius: 10px; justify-content: center; align-items: center;

text.data-name: Hello, my name is Trzynu and I am a self-taught front-end developer and UI designer. I specialize in web and Python development.

developer and UI designer. I specialize in web and Python
